verses.verse: <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and they <S%H5265>moved<s%> from <S%H7851>Shittim,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> he and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there before they passed <S%H5674>over.<s%>
It happened <S%H7097>after<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of the <S%H4264>camp;<s%>

and they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5265>it,<s%> then you shall move from your <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310>it.<s%>

Yet there shall be a <S%H7350>space<s%> between you and <S%H505>it,<s%> about two thousand <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%> <S%H7126>Don't<s%> come near to <S%H3045>it,<s%> that you may know the <S%H1870>way<s%> by which you must <S%H3212>go;<s%> for you have not <S%H5674>passed<s%> this <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8543>before.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>"Sanctify<s%> <S%H4279>yourselves;<s%> for tomorrow <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> among <S%H7130>you.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Take <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>" They took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3117>"Today<s%> I will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H1431>magnify<s%> you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that as I was with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will be with you.

You shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'When you come to the <S%H7097>brink<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you shall stand <S%H5975>still<s%> in the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>'"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Come <S%H5066>here,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Hereby you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and that he will without fail drive the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H3423>out<s%> from before <S%H6440>you.<s%>
<S%H727>Behold,<s%> the ark of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%> passes <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
Now therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man.<s%>

It shall come to <S%H3709>pass,<s%> when the soles of the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> will be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> even the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above;<s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5067>heap.<s%>"

It <S%H5971>happened,<s%> when the people <S%H5265>moved<s%> from their <S%H168>tents<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> being <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

and when those who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> had <S%H2881>dipped<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> (for the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4390>overflows<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks<s%> all the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>),

that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H5975>stood,<s%> <S%H259>and<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5067>heap,<s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> way <S%H7368>off,<s%> at <S%H121>Adam,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H6891>Zarethan;<s%> and those that went <S%H3381>down<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> even the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> were wholly cut <S%H3772>off.<s%> Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> right against <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground,<s%> until all the <S%H1471>nation<s%> had <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8552>completely<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
